amendment.description: To add career and technical education as a core academic subject.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2096 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2096 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Kaine to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S4906, S4912, S4914-4915, S4915; text: CR S4912) To add career and technical education as a core academic subject.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2096 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2096 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Kaine to Amendment SA 2089.
